text: The <extra_id_0> tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene product of human T-cell leukemia virus type I ( HTLV-I ) is a potent transcriptional activator that both stimulates viral gene expression and activates an array of cellular genes involved in T-cell growth .

In resting T cells , many of these NF-kappa B / Rel factors are sequestered in the cytoplasm by various ankyrin-rich inhibitory proteins , including <extra_id_0> I kappa B alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
